content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s cashmere tend 1 100% cashmere each skein is 82 yards/ 50 grams approximately 160 yards required we used green sea - us 8 5 mm 16-inch circular needles 2 - a stitch marker 3 optional gauge 22 stitches and 30 row = 4 inches in mistake rib pattern size finished circumference 16¾ inches unstretched finished height approximately 11 inches designed for purl soho by jake canton 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/cashmere-tend 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=964 5 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 6 http //www jakecanton com/
